name: ORTHO_CHG_PLAN_COVERAGES
description: This table contains coverages for orthodontic charging plans.

columns.name: DENTAL_BILLING_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the treatment plan record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ORTHODONTIC_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique coverage ID for the orthodontic charging plan line. This is only set for insurance plans and should be used if a payer (I DTP 404) isn't specified.
